author: Hannah Al-Othman
title: British Shop Workers Say Abusive Customers and A Lack Of PPE Are Making Their Work During The Coronavirus Lockdown Terrifying
description: “I'm not one normally to suffer anxiety but I'm getting extremely anxious before my shifts start. Sometimes to the point that I get the shakes. I am scared.”View Entire Post ›
content:
